name: Sahuagin High Priestess

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: The high priestess has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
text: The high priestess can breathe air and water, but she needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
text: The high priestess can magically command any shark within 120 feet of her, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Spellcasting
text: The high priestess is a 7th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, mending, resistance, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): bless, detect magic, guiding bolt
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon (trident)
• 3rd level (3 slots): bestow curse, fear, mass healing word, tongues

action.name: Multiattack
text: The high priestess makes two attacks with her toothsome staff, or one attack with her bite and one with her claws.

action.name: Toothsome Staff
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

spells: guidance, mending, resistance, thaumaturgy, bless, detect magic, guiding bolt, hold person, spiritual weapon, bestow curse, fear, mass healing word, tongues, banishment
description:
A sahuagin high priestess is the most devout and ferocious of all Sekolah's worshipers. Armed with a staff studded with jagged shark's teeth, she can be seen leading dark rituals in The Final Enemy.
Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 251, Essentials Kit: Sleeping Dragon's Wake
